actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 542(c) of the Internal Revenue Code to include a one-bank holding company among the exception to the tax penalty facilitating the transfer of a bank from one independent ownership to another.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude one-bank holding companies from the definition of personal holding company for purposes of the tax imposed on such holding companies.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 542(c) of the Internal Revenue Code to include a one-bank holding company among the exception to the tax penalty facilitating the transfer of a bank from one independent ownership to another.
